#summary Quick guide for filter feature.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Learn how to use filter like an advanced user.


= Details =

There are 2 zones : 
  * Excludes items
  * Includes items

Expressions are always multiline.
Each line are considered as OR operator.

Each words (blank separated) is considered as a term.
A blank means OR.

{{{
iPad iPhone iPod
}}}
will filter all items with one of these words

Here, it is the same as in multiline
{{{
iPad
iPhone
iPod
}}}

A complete phrase can be used using quotes : 
{{{
"Guitar Hero"
}}}


If you want use regular expression, start your term with a #
{{{
#[iI]P[ao]d|ne
#[iI]os\s*\d+
}}}
